name: perra
description: haxelib bitmap target JavaScript as API

scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir -p dist/src && cd .. &&  haxe test/targets/test-js-expose.hxml  && mv  perra/src/bitmap.js  perra/src/bitmap.js2 && echo "//@ts-nocheck" > perra/src/bitmap.js && echo "" >> perra/src/bitmap.js && cat perra/src/bitmap.js2 >> perra/src/bitmap.js && rm perra/src/bitmap.js2 && echo "export namespace bitmap {export var Color:any; export type Color=any}" >> perra/src/bitmap.d.ts  && cd perra && npm run copy &&  npx tsc
scripts.docs: npm run docs-readme-toc && npm run docs-api
scripts.docs-api: rm -rf apidocs && typedoc --ignoreCompilerErrors --theme markdown --out apidocs --readme none  --excludeExternals --excludeNotExported --mode modules --name perra --includeDeclarations src/bitmap.d.ts
scripts.lint: npm run organizeImports && npm run format
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run format && npm run build && npm run test && npm run docs
scripts.all-publish: npm run all && git commit -a -m 'version patch' && npm version patch && npm publish
